from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
table = [["Sun","696,000",1.989e30],
         ["Earth","6,371",5.972e24],
         ["Moon","1,737",7.34e22],
         ["Mars","3,390",6.39e23]]

  table,

))

title: thesctrading
section: ğŸ“ˆ FRED Data: Software Developer Job Postings
text:
ğŸ“ˆ FRED Data: Software Developer Job Postings


Code
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from fredapi import Fred

# Connect to FRED
fred = Fred(api_key="1c00931ee7dc4304c6bb68b72fb2d68f")

# Fetch data
series_id = "IHLIDXUSTPSOFTDEVE"
data = fred.get_series(series_id)

# Convert to DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["Job Postings"])
df.index.name = "Date"
df = df.reset_index()

# Display last 5 rows as table
df.tail()









Date
Job Postings

Code
# Plot the time series
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 4))
plt.plot(df["Date"], df["Job Postings"], linewidth=2)
plt.title("US Software Developer Job Postings Index")
plt.xlabel("Date")
plt.ylabel("Index Value")
plt.grid(True)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
